Name: Todo App with Django
Description: A simple Todo App built with Django where users can manage tasks, mark them as complete, and organize them into active and completed categories. This app provides a dashboard where users can interact with tasks, view active tasks, and move them to a completed section.

Name: Real Time Weather Dashboard
Description: A streamlined weather application that provides real-time updates for any location. Users can easily check current weather conditions by entering a ZIP code. Built with Go and hosted on Google Cloud Platform using Cloud Run, the app is optimized for speed, scalability, and simplicity, offering a clean, user-friendly interface for quick access to weather information.

Name: Password Generator Web Service
Description: A web application built with the Gin framework in Go, designed to generate and serve secure random passwords. Hosted on Google Cloud Platform using Cloud Run, this application ensures fast performance and scalability, providing users with a simple and efficient tool to generate strong passwords on demand.

Name: City Poly Rivarly API
Description: An API built in Go that provides endpoints to retrieve detailed information about the historic City-Poly game. Hosted on Google Cloud Platform using Cloud Run, the project is integrated with Cloud Build for continuous deployment, connected to a GitHub repository for seamless updates and version control.
